explains: vt. 激励；使充满活力，使精力充沛
wordGroup: pep talk 鼓舞士气的讲话

sentences.en: A walk in the fresh air will pep you up.
sentences.cn: 在清新空气中散散步会使你精神振奋。

sentences.en: The Democrats held a pep rally on Capitol Hill yesterday.
sentences.cn: 民主党昨天在国会山召开了竞选誓师大会。

sentences.en: Powell and Cheney spent the day giving pep talks to the troops.
sentences.cn: 鲍威尔和切尼花了一整天给部队作鼓舞士气的讲话。
